original_text: “If anyone borrows an animal from their neighbor and it is injured or dies while the owner is not present, they must make restitution.
korean_text: 만일 이웃에게 빌려온 것이 그 임자가 함께 있지 아니할 때에 상하거나 죽으면 반드시 배상하려니와

sentences.original_text: If anyone borrows an animal from their neighbor
and it is injured or dies
while the owner is not present
